# 爬取一篇文章
```{r}
library(rvest)
link<-"http://www.gov.cn/premier/2019-03/16/content_5374314.htm"
web<-read_html(link,encoding="utf-8")
position<-web %>% html_nodes("div.pages_content") %>% html_text()
position
library(jiebaR)
engine_s<-worker()
seg<-segment(position,engine_s)#分词
f<-freq(seg) #统计词频
f<-f[order(f[2],decreasing=TRUE),]
table(seg)
head(f)
